source.9603dc3f:
ply.scatter(data_frame= gdp_data,
           x= "gdp_cap",
           y="life_exp",
           animation_frame="year",
           animation_group="country",
           size="population", 
           color="continent", 
           hover_name="country",
           log_x=False, size_max=55, range_x=[298,114000], range_y=[25,100],
           hover_data=["gdp"] 
           )
